JobTitle: Sr. Manager, Contracts – Hypersonics Portfolio Lead
JobFullDesc: Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) has an opening for a Senior Manager, Contracts to lead the Hypersonics Programs within RMD’s Advanced Technology organization, which focuses on key pursuits as well as development efforts that serve as the growth engine and front end of the business, critical to the future growth of RMD.  RMD is working on the forefront of technology, advancing industry knowledge and capabilities to meet and overcome the challenges of hypersonic flight, and accelerating development of hypersonic weapons using state-of-the art expertise and investment in new infrastructure, people, and technology. Fielding these weapons is vital to our national security. The Senior Manager will lead and supervise a team of five Contracts professionals, providing day-to-day as well as strategic Contracts leadership for the Advanced Technology Hypersonics portfolio. This highly competitive total system development area requires quick turn proposal responses, robust Intellectual Property strategies, and novel contracting approaches. This position offers the candidate a broad opportunity to engage in varied contract activities for several portfolios of programs which include strategic competitive pursuits and several large development efforts in the early phases.This role includes analysis of Request for Proposals (RFP), proposal reviews and coordination, contract negotiation, estimate at completion (EAC) reviews, support of program management and execution reviews, Intellectual Property and investment strategy development, and general contract administration. Responsibilities include working closely with the Portfolio Directors, Program Managers, Chief Engineers, Business/Estimating, and Supply Chain to construct, submit and negotiate pricing proposals; providing guidance to senior management regarding contractual and business issues; ensuring that negotiated terms and conditions comply with company policies; advising management of contractual rights and obligations and possible mitigation of contractual/program risks.About Us:Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) provides the industry's most advanced end-to-end solutions, delivering the advantage of one innovative partner that connects vision with precision to detect, track, intercept and neutralize threats. We’re on a mission to create a safer future by being the place our customers turn to tackle their most complex challenges. Our broad portfolio includes air and missile defense systems, precision weapons, radars, command and control systems, and advanced defense technologies.Our RMD Contracts teammates are valued business partners, influencing and executing balanced business deals, collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, all in support of the products and services we deliver to our customers. With a global portfolio of clients, partners, and suppliers, the development opportunities for our Contracts professionals are endless, both domestically and abroad.Our success is driven by a strong culture, investing in our people, and by embracing the perspectives of a diverse workforce.
